main.name: Jack Meier
main.description: with experience in designing, developing, and maintaining web applications.
main.bio1: I am currently enrolled in a coding bootcamp with UCSD Extension. Prior to the start of the bootcamp, I served in the U.S. Navy for three years as an Intelligence Officer. My longtime fascination with technology and computers has led me to begin a new career in software development.
main.bio2: After graduating high school, I attended a United States Naval Academy Foundation school called New Mexico Military Institute located in Rosewell, New Mexico. After a successful academic year in New Mexico, I earned my appointment to the Naval Academy in the spring of 2013. After four challenging, yet rewarding, years in Annapolis, I earned my B.S. in Mathematics and commissioned as an officer in May 2017.
main.bio3: My hobbies include going on adventures with my wife such as traveling or finding new places to eat in San Diego. I also enjoy running, watching sports, reading, cooking/baking, bowling, playing board games, and taking our puppy, Ollie, out for walks.
